name: ChemistrySizeDistributionSpatial
description: Like ChemistrySizeDistribution, but allow to associate the domains to different phases and spatial distributed cells.  The cells positions are described with one coordinate using either a linear, cylindrical or spherical coordinate system. To reduce the number of domains, the particle size distribution in each domain is assumed to be log-normal distributed.

dimensions.name: ndomains
dimensions.description: Number of particle size domains.  The matrix is not counted as a domain.

dimensions.name: ncoords
dimensions.description: Number of coordinates or spatial dimensions.  For a 1D diffusion model like gbseg, this will be 1.

properties.name: elements
properties.description: Chemical symbol of each chemical element.  By convension the dependent element (e.g. Al) is listed first.

properties.name: coordinate_system
properties.description: Spatial coordinate system.  Should be either 'linear', 'cylindrical' or 'spherical'.

properties.name: cell_width
properties.description: Width of the cells.  Only used for linear systems.

properties.name: cell_height
properties.description: Height of the cells.  Only used for linear and cylindrical systems.

properties.name: cellborders
properties.description: The position of the upper edge of each cell.  The lower edge of the first cell is in origo.

properties.name: X0
properties.description: Overall nominal composition of the full system.  Should sum to one.

properties.name: Xd
properties.description: Average composition.  Each row should sum to one.

properties.name: rd
properties.description: Equivalent spherical radius (radius of a sphere with the same volume as the particle) for each domain.

properties.name: shape
properties.description: Shape parameter for each domain.  It is defined as ``6*sqrt(pi)*V/S^(3/2)``, where V and S are the particle volume and surface area, respectively.  The shape parameter will always be equal to or less than one, where one corresponds to spherical particles.

properties.name: phasename
properties.description: The phase associated with each domain.

properties.name: cell
properties.description: The index of the cell that each domain belongs to.  The first cell has index 1.

properties.name: atvol
properties.description: Average volume per atom for each phase.
